ygData.subject: RE: Hello, Question for ya.
ygData.msgSnippet: We have everything but sheet metal (unless somebody else found it) in Neriak. Go to the bottom floor of the Blind Fish. There are 2 merchants facing the dart
ygData.messageBody:
We have everything but sheet metal (unless somebody else found it) in
Neriak. Go to the bottom floor of the Blind Fish. There are 2 merchants
facing the dart boards. The guy on the left has all 3 sizes of Ore and
Sharpening Stones.

Drizben D'vorn
High Priest of Innoruuk

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Connar O'morris/NVidia/US [SMTP:comorris@...]
> Sent: Monday, August 09, 1999 1:22 PM
> To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
> Subject: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Hello, Question for ya.
>
> From: "Connar O'morris/NVidia/US" <comorris@...>
>
> Greetings,
>
> I am new to the blacksmithing trade and I have a question for those
> who know. I am a Darkelf so my supplys are quite limited. In searching my
> city I found Bricks of Ore for sale but no Small Peases of Ore. The
> blacksmithing handbook states the break down of the different sizes of ore
> but how do you break down the ore? Thank you for your help.
>
> Millidh
> Dark Elf Warrior
> Fighting the war on TZ
>
